attributes.action: Ensure HMG only does business with companies that pay their fair share of tax.
attributes.background: British businesses are going under because HMG is choosing foreign suppliers that practice tax avoidance.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you would like the Government to define "companies that pay their fair share of tax". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
